name: Cucumber Mint Sauce
description: This sauce makes a tart contrast to the soy and chili sauce that is often served with Thai shrimp cakes. It also makes a wonderful foil for spicy salmon cakes.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup loosely packed fresh mint leaves
1/2 jalapeno pepper, stemmed, seeded and coarsely chopped
1 cucumber, peeled, seeded and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place mint and jalapeno pepper in a food processor. Process until chopped. Add cucumber and process until finely chopped. Transfer mixture to a bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients. Refrigerate until cold.
